title: Who can be contacted to have flashing school zone signs erected on Gordon Road to mark the school zone speed limit in front of Eaton Elementary?  There are signs and markings in the road but drivers continue to do 45 mph (and faster) through this zone despite the existing signage. I believe the flashing signs would benefit the safety of all traveling on this congested road.
